description:
Urara expresses hostility towards Momoka during morning training. 
The natto-hating Maya is cast for a natto commercial. 
In the club room after school, Momoka ends up alone with the silent Kayo...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le piège de la miss à couettes - Préparation mentale – Tué ou être tué... en silence
Twin Tail Trap / Mental Training / Silent Kill or Die
Twintail no Wana / Seishin Training / Chinmoku no Kill or Die
ツインテールのワナ / 精神トレーニング / 沈黙のKILL or DIE
